title: Preparation and stability investigation of ultrasound-assisted W/O/W multiple nanoemulsions co-loaded with hydrophobic curcumin and hydrophilic arbutin for tyrosinase inhibition
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Mathukorn Sainakham, Bouachompoo Promma, Arthima Ngernthong, Kanokwan Kiattisin, Korawinwich Boonpisuttinant, Krisada Wuttikul, Pensak Jantrawut, Warintorn Ruksiriwanich
